name: Star Wars Galaxies
summary: Star Wars Galaxies was a Star Wars themed massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) for Microsoft Windows, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts.
info:
• 开发: Electronic Arts
  • 发行: LucasArts
  • 游戏类型: MMORPG
  • 游玩人数: Multiplayer
  • 发行日期: June 26, 2003
